title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From ideas to impact: Architecting with cloud best practices (ARC204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从创意到影响：基于云最佳实践的架构设计 (ARC204)
abstract: 2025 marks the 10-year anniversary of the AWS Well-Architected Framework, Cloud Adoption Framework, and AWS Cloud Operating Model. Learn how these foundational frameworks evolved through customer feedback and real-world learnings from thousands of organizations. What began as structured guidance has matured into dynamic insights for optimizing cloud environments. Discover how this continuous feedback drives innovation across architecture reviews, operations, and remediation. Learn practical strategies for applying these unified best practices to accelerate cloud transformation.
abstract_cn: 2025年标志着AWS Well-Architected Framework、Cloud Adoption Framework和AWS Cloud Operating Model十周年。了解这些基础框架如何通过客户反馈和数千家组织的实际经验不断演进。最初的结构化指导已经发展成为优化云环境的动态洞察。探索这种持续反馈如何推动架构审查、运营和修复方面的创新。学习应用这些统一最佳实践的实用策略，以加速云转型。
